channel.title: Got a random warning for advertisement? Any Ideas Why?
channel.description:
so basicly i got an advertisement warning for god knows what and it doesnt say what i did is anyone able to check what i did or anything kinda suprized at this :P:
[quote=""MoparScape.org""]x_9xp_x,
You have received a warning for advertising.
Please cease these activities and abide by the forum rules otherwise we will take further action.
Regards, The MoparScape.org Team.[/quote]
i cant cease it if i dont know what it is :P

item.title: Got a random warning for advertisement? Any Ideas Why?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[Youtube] *redacted* Channel. [Lets Plays, Gameplays And Much More]
Advertising your own youtube channel is not allowed.

Read full topic
